page.title: 10TROON Cornwall - Religion
page.content: TROON use to have a strong religious community but numbers attending the churches and chapels are dwindling. The two main religions are Wesleyan Methodist and Church of England. TROON has one Wesleyan Chapel and a small cemetary Chapel in the village, and a Church of England church at Treslothan, about 2Km to the west of the village. The vicarage for this used to be next to the church but has now been moved to a house in the village centre to allow the incumbent to be closer to his parishoners.
